title: Two including woman arrested for aiding and abetting Kotahena shooting incident
byline: Two suspects including a woman have been arrested for aiding and abetting the recent shooting and murder of a person in the Kotahena area, by the Colombo District Crime Division, yesterday (13).

title: Fairly heavy rainfall expected in parts of the island
byline: Prevailing rainy conditions are expected to continue in the Northern and Eastern provinces due to the low-level atmospheric disturbance developing to the east of the island, today (14), the Department of Meteorology said.

title: BBC apologises to Trump over speech edit but rejects defamation claim
byline: The British Broadcasting Corporation sent a personal apology to U.S. President Donald Trump on Thursday but said there was no legal basis for him to sue the public broadcaster over a documentary his lawyers called defamatory.
